roleset.name: support with or as if with a splint

example.name: Doctor and Patient as one
example.text: This horrible injury was life threatening, occurring as it did high on a cold mountain, but he managed to splint his leg and crawl down the mountain to be rescued.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Rufus's splinting of his broken ankle prevented it from becoming a compound fracture as he trudged back to camp.

roleset.note: SPLINT-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from splint.01-v)
